explains: v. 承认（admit 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: admit of 容许，有…的可能

sentences.en: He was conditionally discharged after admitting the theft.
sentences.cn: 他承认偷盗行为后被有条件地释放了。

sentences.en: Many people felt that admitting to stress was a sign of weakness.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为，承认压力是懦弱的表现。

sentences.en: If he resigned it would be tantamount to admitting that he was guilty.
sentences.cn: 他若辞职就等于承认自己有错。
